body: If I have video of a hacker, should I put it on YouTube so mods can see it? Or should I put it somewhere else?<br id="null"><br id="null"><br id="null">Lock this after answered.
body_tagged: If I have video of a hacker, should I put it on YouTube so mods can see it? Or should I put it somewhere else?<br id="null"><br id="null"><br id="null">Lock this after answered.
title: Hacker Footage

replies.body: Upload your video to youtube and post it under "Report a Player" (use the format provided there also)
